featured.text: In his resignation speech, he blamed his failings on the fact that he was blood type B. The blood-type craze, considered simply harmless fun by some Japanese, may manifest itself as prejudice and discrimination.
He blamed his failings on local officials.
For the five highway deaths, the author blames (A) a large heavy station wagon.

definition.en_def: To assign responsibility for a fault or wrong.
definition.example: She didn't want to blame anyone for the mistake.
